name: DIE'CE
description:
RULES:

  1. Player can use WSAD and Arrow keys to move
  2. Player can throw dice by clicking the RMB
  3. Player should avoid all incoming enemies
  4. Player wins by Reaching the end of the level
  5. Everytime the player throws the dice , the outcome changes
  6. If the player rolls
    1) An explosion occurs causing minor damage to the enemies
    2) The Enemy that the Die hits Shall Duplicate
    3) The die releases a poison gas , this Damages the enemy over a small period of time
    4) Lighting hits the ground damaging all enemies in the area
    5) The die releases a smoke that heals enemies .
    6) Blackhole that sucks enemies closer to it , any Enemy that touches the Centre dies instantly
  7.  The player can pick up a healing item to regain health
